programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Adam Driver and Penélope Cruz. Enzo Ferrari and his wife Laura have equal shares in their car-manufacturing company, but their marriage is in tatters following the death of their son, while the business is in financial peril. With the 1957 Mille Miglia endurance race looming, Enzo seeks victory for Ferrari, whatever the cost Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman Rusty Cundieff - Director Josh Hutcherson - Franklin Fox Morgan Freeman - Anton Burrell Greg Germann - Sig Thorenson Lovie Simone - Jala Bevin Bru - Renee Renzler Sammi Rotibi - Calvert.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: Out to kill a man he has never met, Wilson, a seasoned assassin completing his final assignment in Fuerteventura, is drawn to a ghostly shipwreck. programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Co Dublin-born fighter pilot Brendan Finucane, known by his colleagues as Paddy, hones his skills in the RAF during the Second World War, eventually becoming the youngest wing commander in its history. programme.title: The Secret Kingdom
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Peter and his younger sister Verity move into a new house and struggle to acclimatise to their surroundings in an emotionally unsettling period for their family. The children tumble into a cavernous space beneath their bedroom and are greeted by an army of pangolins, who decree Peter their ruler. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Crime/detective, Romance, Thriller ║ 2000 ║ 12
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Sandra Bullock and Michael Caine. Hard-nosed FBI agent Gracie Hart is about as far removed from a beauty queen as you could find. But when a terrorist threatens the Miss United States beauty contest, she is the only person available to go under cover and thwart the attack. programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2000 action comedy, starring Sandra Bullock. After saving the day at the Miss United States beauty contest, FBI Agent Gracie Hart has become a media sensation. programme.title: Lee

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. Claire then reconnects with her estranged college pal, Evelyn, who agrees to help out - if only to see if Claire really follows through.. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Action drama starring Bradley Cooper and Sienna Miller. programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Spy action thriller based on the novel by Robert Ludlum, starring Matt Damon and Franka Potente. Jason Bourne is rescued from the Mediterranean with bullet wounds in his back and suffering from amnesia. programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG

programme.title: Field of Dreams

Ray Kinsella, an unfulfilled Iowa farmer, hears a mysterious voice that inspires him to build a baseball field on his land, to the consternation of his family and neighbours. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. programme.title: Lifeblood: History
programme.desc: The first film in our Lifeblood series tells the story of our legendary Academy, all the way up to Alejandro Garnacho's breakthrough.

programme.title: Lifeblood: Innovation
programme.desc: Watch the second film in our Academy showcase, led by an incredible Scott McTominay interview.

programme.title: Lifeblood: Developing People
programme.desc: The third Lifeblood episode focuses on how the Manchester United Academy develops both the person and the player, with Kobbie Mainoo reflecting on his own educational journey.

programme.title: Lifeblood: Climbing the Mountain
programme.desc: The final film in the first Lifeblood series follows the full pathway of an academy player through the various age groups, culminating in a thrilling U18s season finale.

programme.title: Lifeblood Short: U16s In Hong Kong

programme.desc: This special Lifeblood short follows Sir Alex Ferguson's appearance at the annual academy celebration and his enduring influence on the next generation of young Reds.

programme.desc: Watch our new One Love film, all about a team of Reds who support each other's mental health.

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves play host to Hull FC in the 2024 Betfred Super League. Sam Burgess' side went down to a 12-man Catalans previously, while Hull FC lost 0-22 to Hull KR at home. (23.02).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Leeds Rhinos clash with Steve McNamara's Catalans Dragons, whose 0-34 victory over London Broncos last week produced four different try-scorers (02.03).

programme.title: De La Hoya v Vargas 2002
programme.desc: De La Hoya's two super welterweight championships and Vargas' WBA super welterweight championship, as well as the vacant light-middleweight championship were all on the line here.

programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: An all-Japanese clash at Ariake Arena in Tokyo as Takuma Inoue defends the WBA bantamweight world title against unbeaten contender Seiya Tsutsumi. (13.10).

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull KR v Castleford
programme.desc: 2024 grand finalists Hull KR get their Super League campaign underway at home to Danny McGuire's Castleford Tigers. The Robins at the final hurdle last season, losing out to Wigan. (14.02).

programme.title: My Icon: Leon McKenzie
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, former Norwich City forward and professional boxer Leon McKenzie discusses the individuals that have inspired him during his life and career.

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Hull KR host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. Previously, Hull were denied three from three in defeat at Salford, while Sam Burgess' side secured back to back wins. (07.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Leigh Leopards host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Two from two on home turf, Leeds are hoping to replicate that same form on the road at Leigh Sports Village here. (08.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos and St Helens meet in the Betfred Super League. Ash Handley was on hand again for the Rhinos previously, scoring the winner in a fiercely contested battle with Leigh. (15.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Salford Red Devils face the champions Wigan Warriors. Salford had to come from behind in round four to secure a third successive win. (14.03).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: Hull KR host rivals Hull FC in round six of the Betfred Super League. The Robins bounced back from consecutive defeats by winning away from home at Huddersfield in round five. (29.03).

programme.title: My Icon: Johnny Nelson (Pt2)
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, former world champion boxer Johnny Nelson discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career. Part 2.

programme.title: My Icon: Ebony Rainford-Brent
programme.desc: In this episode, former England cricket star and World Cup winner Ebony Rainford-Brent discusses the individuals that have inspired her in her life and career.

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: The Chiefs resume their bid for an unprecedented three-peat, as the back-to-back Super Bowl champions enter the postseason with a divisional-round match against the Houston Texans. (18.01).

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: Get up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news, headline-making interviews and local NFL stories.

programme.title: Fight Night From The Vault
programme.desc: The main event spotlight shines upon Arnold Barboza Jr and Danielito Zorrilla as the two unbeaten super-lightweights enter the squared circle for ten rounds of boxing. (16.07).
